title: Domain 5.5: Given a scenario, troubleshoot common issues with mobile devices.
content:
📱 5.5 – Common Mobile Device Issues

🔋 Poor Battery Health

Battery drains quickly or doesn’t hold a charge.

✅ Fix: Calibrate battery or replace it.

⚠️ Swollen Battery

Swelling may lift the screen or damage the device.

✅ Fix: Stop using immediately. Replace battery safely.

📉 Broken Screen

Cracks or LCD damage impair usability and display.

✅ Fix: Replace screen or full device.

🔌 Improper Charging

Caused by faulty cable, charger, port, or internal circuitry.

✅ Fix: Test with known-good accessories. Inspect port.

📶 Poor/No Connectivity

Issues with airplane mode, SIM, or damaged antenna.

✅ Fix: Toggle settings, reinsert SIM, or repair antenna.

💧 Liquid Damage

Can short circuits, corrode components, or cause failure.

✅ Fix: Power off immediately, dry out, or seek professional repair.

🔥 Overheating

From bad battery, environment, or background apps.

✅ Fix: Close apps, cool the device, check battery health.

🖐️ Digitizer Issues

Touchscreen is unresponsive or inaccurate.

✅ Fix: Screen or digitizer replacement may be needed.

🔧 Physically Damaged Ports

Worn/damaged charging or headphone ports cause poor connection.

✅ Fix: Replace port or device if unrepairable.

🦠 Malware

Causes popups, lag, overheating, and battery drain.

✅ Fix: Use antivirus or reset device to factory settings.

🎯 Cursor Drift / Touch Calibration

Touch input registers inaccurately.

✅ Fix: Recalibrate or reset device settings.
